availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David S. Hollman (Lyon County, Kentucky, stone mason)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, stone mason. Pennsylvania native. Married to Anna Maria Herr Hollman. Father of Michael R. Hollman, Agnes C. Hollman, Martha E. Hollman, Albina Hollman, Juniata Hollman, America Hollman, David Hollman, and Mary Hollman. Stone cutter in Lyon County in 1850. Master stone mason in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 328A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 763.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Greene County, Beaver Creek, p. 52A.
"David Straus Holman (1812-1890)," Find A Grave, Memorial #218747334, accessed November 17, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/218747334.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Hamilton County Marriages, 1900-1901, Film #000355061, p. 36.
